text: KROV (91.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Oroville, California. The station is owned by Bird Street Media Project and airs a variety format. The station was assigned the KROV call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on March 29, 2012. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * ROV (FM) Category:Radio stations established in 2013 Category:2013 establishments in California Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Community radio stations in the United States Category:Butte County, California
title: KROV (FM)
